## Task Objective
One atomic objective only.

## Problem
Describe the concrete current failure or gap.

## Outcome
Describe what must be true when complete.

## Constraints
List policy, scope, safety, and repo constraints.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] AC-1 (testable)
- [ ] AC-2 (testable)

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Required artifacts are produced
- [ ] Verification commands are listed and pass
- [ ] Failure conditions are listed

## Verification Commands
1. <command>
2. <command>

## Failure Conditions
- Any verification command fails
- Required artifact missing
